title: Verify: Implement Policy Cancel Output and Fallback Trigger
description:
Run automated tests for task T-003.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Extend the Lane C ControlEngine and LaneArbitrator to support policy cancel events that immediately stop Lane B audio and trigger fallback handling. Ensure the fallback planner is invoked and the correct arbitration state transitions occur.
Criteria:
- Policy cancel event from Lane C stops Lane B audio playback
- FallbackPlanner is invoked when cancel_output is triggered
- LaneArbitrator transitions to FALLBACK_PLAYING state
- Session resumes listening after fallback completes
acceptance_criteria: Policy cancel event from Lane C stops Lane B audio playback
FallbackPlanner is invoked when cancel_output is triggered
Session resumes listening after fallback completes
